attributes.action: think all listed building such as City Halls, should have disabled access for all
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We live in Newcastle Upon Tyne and we can't use our City Hall, this is due to lack of access; the toilets are down three flights of stairs. You can't see any shows because you always sat behind a big pole. We think all listed buildings should have access for all in this day and age. Please sign this petition if you agree with us.
